SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into ReleaseDate (movie_id, year, month, day, weekday) values (#{movieId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{day,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{weekday,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update ReleaseDate set movie_id = #{movieId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER}, month = #{month,jdbcType=INTEGER}, day = #{day,jdbcType=INTEGER}, weekday = #{weekday,jdbcType=INTEGER} where date_uuid = #{dateUuid,jdbcType=BINARY}
mapper.select: select date_uuid, movie_id, year, month, day, weekday from ReleaseDate
